Class main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters.Character

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters.Player 
    public abstract class main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters.Character
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.jsfml.graphics.Drawable, main.java.questfortheabodeth.interfaces.Collidable
    An abstract class to define all the common attributes that both the main.java.questfortheabodeth.characters and all monsters will have
